class.name: DVThemeManager
class.brief_description: Autoload node that stores and distributes the active DVTheme to all components.
class.description:
DVThemeManager acts as the central theme registry for the addon. Add it as an autoload to your project to make [method get_singleton] available from anywhere. Components connect to the manager to be notified when [member active_theme] changes, allowing you to switch dashboards between light and dark modes instantly.
The manager can also load a default theme from disk at startup by configuring [member default_theme_path], making it easy to ship curated style presets with your addon.

method.name: load_default_theme
method.description: Loads and applies the theme referenced by [member default_theme_path] if it exists.

members.member: Theme instance distributed to connected components.
Resource path loaded during startup when [method load_default_theme] is called automatically.

signal.name: theme_changed
signal.description: Emitted after [member active_theme] is replaced. Subscribers receive the new theme instance.
